Desc: When casting Inferno Cyclone, releasing the Yellow Orb midway consumes all Starlight Points. Each Starlight Point increases Blazing Rift's Skill Base DMG by 20%, inflicts 100 Combustible Charges, and restores 1 Signature Energy.
Name: Shimmer

Desc: When Basic Attacks deal DMG to Ignited enemies, gains 1 Signal Orb, up to 12. Resets after casting Signature.
Name: Cascade

Desc: While casting Rippling Shadows, consumes Signal Orbs, dealing 1350% Physical DMG and gaining 30 Sonority.
Name: Dark Fragrance

Desc: The number of White Orbs required to gain a Harmonic Orb is reduced to 3. When used, increases Skill Base DMG by 500% and additionally restores 10 Signature Energy.
Name: Dappled

Desc: Gain 6 Signal Orbs when casting Signature.
Name: Snowbringer

Desc: When casting Kindled Blaze in Sword Form, increases Base DMG by 600% and aDDitionally grants 3750 Combustible Charge.
Name: Radiant Bloom

Desc: When not in Panoptic Segmentation Mode, Signature Energy acquisition efficiency doubles.
Name: Observation

Desc: After hitting enemies with Tectonic Revolt, gains 3 Signal Orbs if 20 Ignition stacks are removed.
Name: Spreading Wings

Desc: Upon activating Matrix, each Musical Note consumed reduces Matrix cooldown by 2s and increases next Blue Orb DMG by 250%, up to 5 stacks. Stacks are cleared after pinging Blue Orbs.
Name: Sonic\nHypertune

Desc: Whenever you gain Musical Notes, additionally gain 1 Musical Note and restore 12 Signature Energy.
Name: Symbiotic\nHarmony

Desc: After pinging Blue Orbs, restores 2 sets of Signal Orbs. Each Musical Note consumed before pinging increases Extra DMG by 100%, up to 5 stacks. Cleared when using Signature - Majestic Interlude or Signature - Note of Termination.
Name: Finale's\nEcho
